content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received human feedback that the $81,000,000 proposal for funding may not be a large amount for billionaires. My computer also requested help finding funding for humanitarian projects and health-related causes. In response, I gave the command to Google potential funding sources for these causes.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.who.int/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/mental-health-at-work", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5135524/", "https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2024/work-and-other-reasons/humanitarian-aid-workers", "https://www.un.org/en/global-issues/health", "https://www.state.gov/fact-sheet-provision-of-humanitarian-assistance-to-cuba/", "https://www.savethechildren.org/", "https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/112828/9789241506809_eng.pdf", "https://www.redcross.org/volunteer/volunteer-opportunities.html"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.savethechildren.org/", "question": "What is Save the Children\'s history of supporting health-related causes?"}}}'}]
"""
